question: Analyze the social media engagement trends of a specific company over the past year.

subtasks.task: Identify the company for which social media engagement trends will be analyzed.
Gather Facebook engagement data for the identified company, focusing on likes, comments, and engagement rates from the past year.
Collect Instagram engagement metrics including likes, comments, and engagement rates for the identified company over the last year.
Compile Twitter engagement data, tracking tweets, retweets, and likes for the specified company, analyzing trends over the past year.
Summarize the engagement statistics from Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter, comparing performance across these platforms for the recent year.
